definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Her husband, who sells used car parts, has seen his commissions drop.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫經銷二手次車配件，他的薪酬也下降了。

sentences.english: Our peripheries are the professional markets of cellular phone accessories and the electronics product export.

sentences.english: All sub-assemblies can be oriented in direction as required by the customer.
sentences.chinese: 所有子配件均可按用戶要求的方向進行定位。

sentences.english: All electrical appliances and accessories are provided by international famous brand products.

sentences.english: Must maintain the original packaging and accessories complete return intact.

sentences.english: PMA spare parts in many western countries have been adopted by the airlines.

sentences.english: B. Connect the drainage accessory with the coupler.

sentences.english: The system eliminated all the soldering to the internal sub-assembly.
sentences.chinese: 該系統去除了連接到內部配件的所有焊接。

sentences.english: However, it is difficult to verify where the information about the source of various products and product parts is coming from.
sentences.chinese: 但是很難覈實多種產品和配件產品信息的來源。

sentences.english: In some cases, it may be necessary to change the accessory stub shaft in the motor.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，可能需要改變電機配件存根軸。
